hero.title: Phoenix Health & Wellness
hero.tagline: Arrive tired. Leave renewed. Rise like the Phoenix.

healing.title: A Healing Touch
healing.p1: When my hands touch a client's back, I first locate any tense muscles or knots. I don't follow a single technique — instead, I communicate with the body through my senses to understand what each client truly needs.
healing.p2: First, I work to release tension and dissolve the knots. Then, I go deeper — using intuition and touch to quiet the mind and restore balance to the whole body.

proverb.quote: Where there is free flow, there is no pain. Where there is pain, there is no free flow.
proverb.label: — Chinese Proverb
proverb.body: Pain is not the enemy — it's a signal. It tells us something in the body needs attention. When clients come in carrying heaviness and discomfort, my hope is simple: that they leave feeling lighter, refreshed, and truly invigorated.

story.title: My Story
story.p1: My journey into massage began long before any formal training. As a child, I watched my grandmother — a midwife — massage pregnant women with care and confidence. She was my first mentor. Later, my godfather taught me the art of cupping and acupuncture, deepening my connection to traditional healing.
story.p2: Wanting to expand my skills, I enrolled in a specialized massage school and later trained at an academy in Utrecht, where I studied Swedish massage techniques. When I first arrived from China, I was struck by the kindness of the Dutch — their patience in teaching someone still finding her way in a new country.
story.p3: Those experiences shaped who I am today: a therapist who blends Eastern intuition with Western technique, guided always by what the body asks for.

phoenix.title: Why "Phoenix"?
phoenix.p1: The phoenix represents resurrection and rebirth — rising from the ashes, transformed and renewed. That is exactly what I want for every client who walks through my door: to arrive weary, and to leave feeling reborn.
phoenix.p2: That's why I named this place Phoenix.

reviews.title: Google Reviews
reviews.item0Text: Had a duo massage today. Both massages were wonderful! Knots were tackled well and the massage was well tailored. Really recommend it! Thanks Lina and Omi:)
reviews.item1Text: Amazing massage, they really read your body and muscles and then tailor the massage to you. The place isn't new, but it has everything you need.
reviews.item2Text: Went to Phoenix with severe back pain. They had helped me before with painful muscles in my leg, so I hoped they could help me this time too.
reviews.item3Text: Phoenix is a really great massage salon! The people are pleasant and give fantastic massages.
reviews.item4Text: A little piece of heaven on earth. So much more than just massage.
reviews.item5Text: Incredibly good massages that last a long time! Highly recommended!
reviews.item6Text: Had another wonderful massage today, the best massage salon ever!!
reviews.item7Text: Best massage ever !!!! Never been massaged so well.
reviews.item8Text: Fantastic massage and super kind people.. !!!
reviews.item9Text: Amazing! They read your body... wonderful.
